title: University Cultural Fest Announced
description: The university will host a cultural festival with food, performances, and activities from around the world. All students and faculty are invited.

title: New Library Hours Starting This Semester
description: The library will now open at 8 AM and close at 10 PM every weekday. Weekend hours remain unchanged.

title: Inter-College Football Tournament
description: Our campus team will participate in the upcoming tournament. Matches start next week at the Main Stadium.

title: Midterm Exam Schedule Released
description: Midterm exams for all departments have been announced. Students can check the academic portal for detailed schedules.
